alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 1:14PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Natrona and east central Fremont Counties through 200 PM MDT... At 113 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Castle Gardens, or 30 miles southeast of Shoshoni, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hiland, Waltman Rest Area and Waltman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Natrona County Lower Elevations; Wind River Basin
